casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Adrian Lemont McFADDEN. No. 432P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 8, 2007. Christopher W. Brooks, Assistant Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of September 2007 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

*706"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of November 2007."
